mapper.select: SELECT ID, PID, NAME, IMAGE_URL, `DESC`, SORT, ENABLED, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME FROM article_category WHERE DELETED = 0 AND ID = #{categoryId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM article WHERE DELETED = 0 AND CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
SELECT ID, PID, NAME, IMAGE_URL, `DESC`, SORT, ENABLED, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME FROM article_category WHERE DELETED = 0 AND NAME = #{name}

SELECT ac.ID, ac.NAME, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM article WHERE DELETED = 0 AND CATEGORY_ID = ac.ID) AS ARTICLE_COUNT FROM article_category ac WHERE ac.DELETED = 0 AND ac.ENABLED = 1 AND ac.PID IS NOT NULL AND ac.ID IN ( SELECT CATEGORY_ID FROM article WHERE DELETED = 0 AND ARTICLE_STATUS = 5 AND ARTICLE_PERM = 1 )
